entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
